tool_input.command:
export GH_TOKEN="${GITHUB_PAT}" && gh pr create --title "bug: #2 - Fix tile size instability: keep board tiles a constant size while preserving responsive layout" --body "$(cat <<'EOF'
## Summary

Fixes tile size instability issues where the game board tiles are changing size across renders and screen sizes, making the grid look unstable and sometimes breaking the layout.

## Implementation Plan

See [specs/issue-2-adw-6ffc5aae-sdlc_planner-fix-tile-size-stability.md](../blob/bug-issue-2-adw-6ffc5aae-fix-tile-size-stability/specs/issue-2-adw-6ffc5aae-sdlc_planner-fix-tile-size-stability.md) for detailed implementation plan.

## Closes

Closes #2

## ADW Tracking

ADW ID: `6ffc5aae`

## Changes Made

- ✅ Created comprehensive implementation plan for tile size stability
- 📋 Identified root cause: missing explicit row height in grid container
- 🔧 Specified fix: add `gridAutoRows: '75px'` to Game.tsx grid container
- 📱 Ensures all tiles are exactly 75px x 75px regardless of content
- 🎯 Validated with existing E2E test for tile size stability

## Key Implementation Details

The plan addresses:
- Fixed tile dimensions using explicit row height to match column width
- Prevents row collapse when tiles are empty or have no content
- Ensures stable rendering across moves and content changes
- Single-line fix in `src/components/Game.tsx`
- Maintains responsive layout while keeping tiles at constant size
EOF
)" --base main
